bill.summary:
Facilitating Participation in Clinical Data Registries Act of 2015
This bill requires the Office for Human Research Protections of the Department of Health and Human Services to issue guidance within one year on the application of the Common Rule, which provides protections for human research subjects, to clinical data registries.
